text: Call for papers - Advancing methods in healthcare research and education"As a medical professional, I am excited to share my passion for advancing methods in healthcare research and education. With over three dozen publications in various fields, including orthopedics, women's health, pediatrics, infectious diseases, and public health, I have dedicated my career to improving patient outcomes through evidence-based practice. As a peer reviewer for multiple medical journals and research instructor for the Online Research Club, Nagasaki, Japan, I am committed to mentoring the next generation of clinical researchers. My areas of interest include medical education, patient safety, global surgery, clinical microbiology, and infectious diseases. Let's work together to push the boundaries of healthcare research and education!
